about_the_game:
Manifest your visions to survive in a new home, and a new life on an untouched planet. Design, build, and furnish your new home inside the relative safety of your new Dome on the Surface of Mars.

Colonize the first alien world for the future of humanity while surviving the relentless, desolate conditions. Overcome the difficulties of life on the Domestead to establish Humanity's next step of Civilization. Guide your Domesteaders through the trials and tribulations of life.

Tailor the details of your Domesteaders appearance, and style.

name: Home Domes Demo
short_description: Explore this life sim on a new planet. Create your new home on the rugged surface of Mars during the early days of colonization inside the safety of your new Dome. Everyday life on a new planet has new challenges and more difficulties of surviving out on the Domestead.
